favourite.article: Thanks for the this article, I choose to fully enjoy the benefits of my salvation in Jesus.
We are saved in His life!!!!!
Hallelujah! God in in us flowing, in our hearts growing. We are saved in His life. I love this hymn. One of my first hymns in the church life. Amen, Hallelujah!

1st John 2:1 "My little children, these things write I to you, that you sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:" "In a low dungeon, hope we had none; Tried to believe, but faith didn’t come; God, our sky clearing, Jesus appearing, We by God were transfused! We by God were transfused! Propitiation made by the blood, Jesus’ redemption bought us for God! No condemnation, justification! We have peace toward God! We have peace toward God!" Praise God for our Lord Jesus Christ. In Him we have peace toward God, even the forgiveness of our sins. Thank You Lord Jesus. we Love You Lord. Amen.
Amen, we are saved in His life!
This song is my experience of regeneration!!! God our sky clearing!! Jesus appearing! We are saved in His LIFE!!
I love his song. It was the first song I learnt when I came to the church life. OH HALLELUJAH SIN Is ERASED!!!!
This is one of my favorite hymns and I enjoy it every time! When we sing it, we mean it - we by God were transfused! Hallelujah!
Through Him we have also obtained access by faith into this grace in which we stand, and we rejoice in hope of the glory of God. ~ Romans 5:2
God has passed over our sins! Praise the Lord. We have peace toward God through Jesus Christ and much, much more, we are saved in His life. Hallelujah!
I love this song because it just fills my heart with joy and it always makes me happy all the time.
I love this song! It is one of my favorites!
